data.expected_result: The icons and the actual mute status matches up. If they're muted the muted icon appears.
data.short_description: Un/Muted icons in Voice connector screen are backwards
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect to any Voice Channel - Tap on the Channel name to bring up the Voice Connector Screen - Not the icons present to indicate if a user is or isn't muted - Close screen - Compare to the listed mute statuses
